Posts.Content: I used the dye after 7 chemo's with 2 to go. Hair was thin before but grey & wispy bits was not my best look ! Think hair has thinned a little more since using dye but that maybe just because hair is now dark so scalp is more obvious ! Overall I am glad I dyed it - Good luck with whatever you decide x
